title: Teen Who Tracks Elon Musk’s Private Jet on Twitter Spurns Cash Offer, Wants a Tesla in Exchange for Stopping
sub_head: Jack Sweeney, a Florida student, says he won’t give up his hobby for anything less than his dream car
body:
A college freshman who is publicly tracking the whereabouts of Elon Musk’s private jet has one request that would make him halt the endeavor.
A new Tesla Model 3.
